divs: Sighting DetailsOn January 1, 2010, at 12:30 PM witness returned home on his motorcycle and while on front of his house he looked up to the north and saw six objects reflecting bright sunlight. Witness and his wife obtained a video camera and binoculars and obtained about 7 minutes of video. The objects changed formation from a V to horizontal and their movement seemed smooth and intelligently controlled. One of the video frames shows an airliner on approach to DFW airport to the south along with one of the objects. The objects appeared farther than the airliner, therefore, they were at least several miles away. The objects appeared circular and shinny silver. Entered by Gary Neitzel, State Section Director, Tarrant Co, Field Investigor, after interviewing witnesses.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Six Objects Videotaped North of Frisco, Texas
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Frisco
There were no other sightings in Frisco on or around January 1st 2010
